article_title: Three bodies recovered in Rafah, Palestinian civil defence says.
sentence: The  Israel  Defense  Forces  (IDF)  continues  to  run  ground  operations  in  the  area,  and  says  last  night  it  "eliminated  a  number  of  terrorists"  Last  week,  the  IDF  killed  the  leader  of  Hamas,  Yahya  Sinwar,  in  a  ground  raid  in  Rafah.
